title: Event Booking
description: Create, view, and book events! Requires authentification to get full experience of the site.

title: React Google Books
description: Using the Google Books API, users can view and save books that they have read or want to read!

title: Social Media SQL
description: Users can create posts and comments! Your future favorite social media platform

title: Quang's Burgers
description: Create burgers to eat! Created burgers gets added to Chef Quang's menu.

title: Flash Cards
description: A study tool to practice Japanese (and potentially other languages). Main activities are flashcards and phrase translations.
